summary: An exclusive look at Marilyn Monroe just before her tragic end. Set in New York City in the 50's - It's a surprising documentary that captures the movie legend as she runs with Broadway pals from the Actors Studio.
cast: Cynthia Adler|James Bacon|Ellen Burstyn|Ben Gazzara|Joshua Greene|Milton H. Greene|Amy Greene-Andrews|Arthur Miller|Marilyn Monroe|Alex Monsky|Donald Spoto|John Springer|Lee Strasberg|Susan Strasberg
title: Marilyn in Manhattan
